# **Solved Previous Year Questions**

This is a website which serves as a ready reference for solutions to conventional type questions that UPSC has fielded for the topic of Structural Analysis - I

## How to use

1. There are tabs dedicated to each topic/module in the subject

2. Each tab has solutions to questions fielded in optional papers of various exams (IFS, CSE, ESE)

3. The requisite theory/concept has been explained concisely in each solution

4. Links are provided to external resources - for those who want to delve deeper into the theory
